story:
Title: The Sunrise Whisper
Scene: Awakening
Script: The alarm chirped softly, a gentle nudge from the universe to begin again. Outside, the first hint of dawn painted the sky with muted hues of rose and gold.
Scene: The First Breath
Script: Sarah stretched, feeling the quiet promise of a new day filling her lungs. Today, she knew, held its own unique magic, waiting to be discovered with every sunrise.

Awakening.script: The alarm chirped softly, a gentle nudge from the universe to begin again. Outside, the first hint of dawn painted the sky with muted hues of rose and gold.

The First Breath.script: Sarah stretched, feeling the quiet promise of a new day filling her lungs. Today, she knew, held its own unique magic, waiting to be discovered with every sunrise.
